long_description: The 3.0 Farmer John wetsuit from NRS provides warmth, comfort and flexibility in cold water. Specialized neoprene uses calcium carbonate instead of petroleum, and it's warmer, lighter, stretchier, more buoyant and more comfortable than traditional neoprene. Stretchy 3mm neoprene provides flexible, formfitting comfort and remarkable warmth. Titanium laminate reflects body heat back to you. Large armholes enhance freedom of movement. Knees have been reinforced and seams are glued and blind-stitched, improving durability. Ankle zippers make slipping the NRS 3.0 Farmer John wetsuit over your booties a breeze.
short_description: The 3.0 Farmer John wetsuit from NRS provides warmth, comfort and flexibility in cold water.
